text:
The documentation for the optional Sound task indicates that the 
attributes "duration" and "loops" are associated with the "sound" element. If 
you use those there, however, Ant errors out saying, "The <sound> task doesn't 
support the 'loops' attribute." You can put "duration" and "loops" on 
the "success" and "fail" child elements, and they work as described.
creator: Eric.Smith@NextPage.com
